pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:0.5: 55. The training rule on being stingy with families
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.2: a certain nun was walking for almsfood along a street in the same town. She then approached a certain family, where she sat down on a prepared seat.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.3: The people there gave her a meal and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.6: “What can I do so that other nuns don’t come?” And she went up to other nuns and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.7: “Venerables, in such-and-such a place there are malicious dogs, a temperamental ox, and it’s muddy.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.9: Another nun, too, approached that family while walking for almsfood along that street. She sat down on a prepared seat
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.10: and the people there gave her a meal. They then asked her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.11: “Venerable, why don’t the nuns come here?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.12: And she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.14: “How can a nun be stingy with a family?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.15: “Is it true, monks, that a nun acted like this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.18: “… How can a nun act like this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.19: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.20: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.21.1: ‘If a nun is stingy with families, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.6: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.8: if she thinks, “What can I do so that other nuns don’t come?” and she then speaks disparagingly of the family in the presence of nuns, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.9: If she speaks disparagingly of nuns in the presence of the family, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.2: if she is not being stingy with families, but describes the disadvantages as they are;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.5: The fifth training rule is finished.
